items.sentence: A bunch of people were standing outside waiting.
A woman whose husband is dead is called a widow.
If Tom has a problem with me, he should tell me.
It might be a long time before you see me again.
Bus transportation is provided for our students.
Can you find the time to play with our daughter?
Children will grow even if you leave them alone.
Did you live in Australia when you were a child?
I need you to show me what you have in your bag.
I never want you to step foot in that bar again.
